question: hi, i was wondering why would i have severe pain in the back of my skull which causes more pain in my neck, back, shoulders, and arms.i have arthritis in my joints. i had cervical fusion done on c5,6 almost a year ago. i have carpal tunnel and diabetes, diabetic neuropathy in both my legs. but now i been having pain in my neck and head. i can not function on a daily basis which my doctor took me out of work the beginning of this year due to these problems and depression.thanks for any information that you can give me.
title: head and spinal pain
